title: Complete talks/speaking data - images and descriptions
description:
talkData.json.ts has ~67 TODOs:
- Missing images for ~40 talks/videos (using placeholder Phoebe.jpg)
- Missing descriptions for many events
- Missing YouTube links for several recorded talks

Events to add:

- Data Day Texas 2023
- Trino Live NYC
- dbt Breakfast Beignet

- Data Rebel Awards
